plot: A hungry young traveler arrives a Chinese town and goes to the food strip street to appease his hunger. The street is full of food stalls, but two of them catch his eye because the cooks are two hot sexy-dressed girls: a brunette Chinese and a blonde Westerner. Both of them eagerly try to get the guy to eat their food (Chine and Western) and convince him that their respective cookery is the best. The guy unwillingly finds himself in the middle of a dispute turned Kung-Fu fight between the two girls, but he just wants to eat something, anything.   Written by  GitanillaOZ
title: Kung Fu cooking girls
